title: The Game Changer: The Final Score
description: The Game Changer: The Final Score is told from 4 different perspectives: Luke, Mikey, JJ & Deanna... (Teaser #1 & Teaser #2 have been moved to my blog page)The story continues with Luke being released from prison, forced to face many challenges that developed due to his careless decisions. His greatest challenge is facing Jesse, the girl he refuses to let go.... Meanwhile, while Mikey handles all that comes with being a young star, he soon realizes that his life isn't fulfilled without the girl that has been tugging at his heart for all of these years.
author: L.M. Trio
